titleStmt.title: The Anti-Levellers antidote against the most venomous of the serpents, the subtillest monopolizers. Collected by divers officers and soldiers of the army, and other honest people of this nation.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Macock, and are to be sold by Francis Tyton at the three daggers in fleetstreet, and Nathaniel Brook at the Angel in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
